summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5554 for the improvement of 51st Avenue Northeast, from East 41st Street to Lake Washington, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 71982, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
